Package com.example.chinesecheckers.utils.Requests.FriendRequests

Class GetFriendRequests

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.chinesecheckers.utils.Requests.VolleyArrayRequest
      • com.example.chinesecheckers.utils.Requests.FriendRequests.GetFriendRequests
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISimpleRequest
    public class GetFriendRequests
extends VolleyArrayRequest
    Gets all friendships that are in the given request type of incoming or outgoing and then displays them in a list using the custom friend request adapter.

    Example:
    GetFriendRequests request = new GetFriendRequests(TAG, this, user, friendRequestList, FriendRequestEnum.INCOMING);
    String URL = Const.URL_INCOMING_FRIEND_REQUESTS + "/" + user.getUID().toString();
    request.sendRequest(Request.Method.GET, URL);

      • GetFriendRequests

        public GetFriendRequests​(java.lang.String tag,
                         android.app.Activity activity,
                         UserModel user,
                         android.widget.ListView listView,
                         FriendRequestEnum requestType)
        Creates the HTTP request object to retrieve either incoming or outgoing friend requests and display them in a list for the user.
        Parameters:
        tag - - activity identifier
        activity - - activity sending the request
        user - - logged in user
        listView - - the list that will display friend requests
        requestType - - the type of friend requests being retrieved either INCOMING or OUTGOING
